mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_업무코드기본 조회 (TaskCdMapper.getTaskCd) */ SELECT task_cd ,task_cd_nm ,up_task_cd ,task_cd_vl ,task_cd_expln ,use_yn ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_TASK_CD" WHERE 1=1 AND task_cd = #{taskCd}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_업무코드기본 수정 (TaskCdMapper.updateTaskCd) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_TASK_CD" SET task_cd_nm = coalesce(#{taskCdNm}, task_cd_nm) ,up_task_cd = coalesce(#{upTaskCd}, up_task_cd) ,task_cd_vl = coalesce(#{taskCdVl}, task_cd_vl) ,task_cd_expln = coalesce(#{taskCdExpln}, task_cd_expln) ,use_yn = coalesce(#{useYn}, use_yn) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND task_cd = #{taskCd}
